title: League crashes when playing ranked
body: So this is the second time this happens, when the game is loading League decides to crash. And when I try to reconnect, it crashes again and again while my network connection is perfect. Now I have low priority queue for the second time in 2 days and it pisses me off. I restarted LoL multiple time, nothing works. Is there something wrong with the servers or is it really just my PC?

replies.body: Sorry to hear this is happening to you.  :(  Even though your connection elsewhere might be perfect, it does look like it's struggling to reach our game server.  You should still run through each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help tune up your network and clear out any blocks.
